summary.span: 表示一个 *n*值元组，其中 *n* 为8或更大。

span.span: Represents an *n*-value tuple, where *n* is 8 or greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 结构表示具有八个或更多元素的值元组。The structure represents a value tuple that has eight or more elements. 值元组类型不同于元组类型 (如 ) ，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as ) as follows: - 它们 (值类型的结构，而不是) (引用类型) 的类。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 成员（例如 和） 是字段而不是属性。Members such as and are fields rather than properties. - 它们的字段是可变的，而不是只读的。Their fields are mutable rather than read-only. 值元组类型提供支持 c # 中的 [元组](/dotnet/csharp/tuples) 和 F # 中的结构元组的运行时实现。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](/dotnet/csharp/tuples) and struct tuples in F#. 除了 使用语言语法创建实例外，还可以调用 工厂方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值元组Serialization and value tuples 该 类型在 .Net Core 1.x 或 .NET Framework 4.7 及更早版本中不可序列化。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET Standard （包括 .NET Standard 2.0）不会强制 对实例进行序列化; 是否 可序列化实例取决于单个 .NET Standard 实现。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要确定某一 类型在特定 .net 实现上是否可序列化，请获取一个 对象，该对象表示 类型并检索其属性的值 。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 有关 .NET Core 和 .NET Framework 中的可序列化类型的列表，请参见 [二进制序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/binary-serialization)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/binary-serialization).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了使用语言的对元组的内置支持外，还可以通过调用静态方法来创建值元组， 而无需显式指定其元素的类型。In addition to using your language's build-in support for tuples, you can also create a value tuple by calling the static method without having to explicitly specify the types of its elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`在下列条件下，参数被视为等于当前实例：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是 值类型。It is a value type. - 其组件的类型与当前实例的组件相同。Its components are of the same types as those of the current instance. - 其组件等于当前实例的组件。Its components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 字段返回一个嵌套值元组，该元组允许访问*n*元组的第八个元素。The field returns a nested value tuple that allows access to the eighth though *n*th elements of the tuple. 根据元组中元素的总数，可通过属性从嵌套值元组检索第8个到第十四个组件的值 `Item1` `Item7` 。Depending on the total number of elements in the tuple, the values of the eighth through fourteenth components can be retrieved from the nested value tuple's `Item1` through `Item7` properties. 然后，您可以使用 嵌套对象的属性 来检索下一层嵌套的值元组。You can then use the property of a nested object to retrieve the value tuple at the next level of nesting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为接口时使用 。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法允许您定义对象的自定义比较 。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，您可以使用此方法根据 特定组件的值对对象进行排序。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 尽管可以直接调用此方法，但它最常由包含参数的集合排序方法调用， 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由 方法和 使用构造函数实例化的对象的方法调用 。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method.

span.span: is not a object.

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified objects; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为接口时使用 。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当不为时，才会调用实现 `other` `null` ，并且如果它可以成功地强制转换为 具有相同的组件总数 (包括嵌套元组对象) 与当前实例相同的类型的对象。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast to a object that has the same total number of components (including those in nested tuple objects) of the same types as the current instance. 方法首先传递 要与实现进行比较的对象的值 。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回 `true` ，将再次调用方法并传递 两个对象的值 。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到方法调用 `false` 在比较特定对值时返回，或将两个 值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of values, or the two values are passed to the method.

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current instance by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为接口时使用 。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对 `comparer` 对象实现的调用 。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个对象返回相同的哈希代码 。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供 结构的实现 。This method provides the implementation for the structure. 尽管可以直接调用方法，但它通常由集合排序方法（如和）的默认重载调用， 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 此方法使用默认的对象比较器来比较每个组件。This method uses the default object comparer to compare each component.

span.span: is not a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串采用的 (形式为： *Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*、 *tuple.item4*、 *tuple.item5*、 *tuple.item6*、 *tuple.item7*、 *Item8*... ) ，其中 *Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*、 *tuple.item4*、 *tuple.item5*、 *tuple.item6*和 *tuple.item7* 表示 、、、、、 和 字段的值。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, *Item7*, *Item8*…), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and fields. *Item8* 表示 实例的字段的值 `Next.Item1` 。*Item8* represents the value of the instance's `Next.Item1` field. 任何其他嵌套元素的值将在 *Item8*之后。The value of any additional nested elements follows *Item8*. 如果任何字段值为，则将 `null` 其表示为 。If any of the field values is `null`, it is represented as .
